description.diamond-pearl:

cold-infused fangs.
It may also make the
foe flinch or freeze.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to freeze the target and a separate $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
effect.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to freeze the target and a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
